27/02/2013 15:52:28	Fabelist Art Classes - Painting "Dream Painting" for 7-14 year olds	Free Art Class 4-5pm for 7-14 year olds at 129, Fortess Road	As part of the Fabelist Art Classes this free art class for 7-14 year olds will be focussing on "Dream Painting" - creating work from a dream you may have had or a fantasy dreamscape.	Amanda - Project Manager Fabelist Art Classes	8th March		Community	4pm	129, Fortess Road	NW5 2HR	fabelistartclasses@gmail.com	www.facebook.com/FabelistArtClasses	Yes
